name: #3 Igan Shemov
description:
Igan Shemov

Race: Human

Subraces and Variants:
Ethnicity: Damaran
Dragonmark Variant: Mark of Sentinel

Physical Characteristics:
Age: 50 years
Height: 5'4"
Weight: 126 lbs.
Eyes: Hazel
Skin: Dark Brown

Gender: Unknown
Class: Mystic
Mystic Order: Order of the Avatar
Background: Spy
Occupation: Artisan or guild member

Trait: I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.
Ideal: Charity. I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. (Good)
Bond: Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.
Flaw: When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.

Description:
Appearance: Exceptionally ugly
High Ability: Constitution-hardy, hale, healthy
Low Ability: Wisdom-oblivious, absentminded
Talent: Draws beautifully
Mannerism: Speaks loudly
Interaction Trait: Quiet
Values: Community (Lawful), Out for revenge
Flaw or Secret: Forbidden love or susceptibility to romance
